DOC.brief_summary: Elbow fracture common young child . Type I supracondylar fracture stable fracture elbow treat conservatively across world typically heal well without complication . There several treatment option , include elbow cast long arm splint . This study aim determine one treatment bad order standardize treatment fracture institution . The investigator hope save family extra hospital visit reduce amount x-ray require treatment fracture .
DOC.brief_title: Splinting Versus Casting Type I Supracondylar Fractures
